name: The Hound's Rescue
description:
You are a magical dog, and your wizard friend Jack has just been captured... You must now fight through a lava dungeon in order to face the Evil Wizard Harry and free your friend!

(This game is not 100% complete as it contains basic shapes and backgrounds instead of an actual dog, crystals, lava, and so forth)

(Also there is a bug in regards to the Restarting and going from the Game to the Menu and back, somehow changes the physics)
